title: Gold hits another all-time high, Alphabet deal, Paramount drama continues

ğŸŒ India & New Zealand trade deal India and New Zealand announced a trade agreement that will make most goods traded between the two countries duty-free, covering trade worth roughly $1.3B.

ğŸ” STOCK SPOTLIGHT

Alphabet (Technology) +0.88% Shares rose after Alphabet agreed to buy data-center infrastructure firm Intersect for $4.75B, supporting its growing AI and cloud demand.

Uber (Global mobility platform) +2.8% The stock climbed after Uber announced a partnership with Baidu to test robotaxis in London next year.

Warner Bros +3.69%, Netflix âˆ’1.22%, Paramount +4.95% (Media) Media stocks moved as Paramount reaffirmed backing from Larry Ellison in its bid for Warner Bros, keeping takeover uncertainty alive.

Dominion Energy (Utilities) âˆ’3.72% Shares fell after the Trump administration halted major offshore wind projects, raising regulatory risk concerns.
